plot: Marve Fleksnes is dying from a heart attack, and is found knocking on Heaven's door. But St. Peter will not let him in before he has pondered his life through.
title: Himmelen kan vente
plot_es: Marve Fleksnes is dying from a heart attack, and is found knocking on Heaven's door. But St. Peter will not let him in before he has pondered his life through.
plot_en: Marve Fleksnes is dying from a heart attack, and is found knocking on Heaven's door. But St. Peter will not let him in before he has pondered his life through.
